advisory.title: Crate `twoway` deprecated by the author
advisory.description: The commit [`e99b3c7`](https://github.com/bluss/twoway/commit/e99b3c718df1117ad7f54c33f6540c8f46cc17dd) releasing version 0.2.2 explicitly deprecates `twoway` in favour of [`memchr`](https://crates.io/crates/memchr) crate.
